pages.text: $(li)The Iceologers, are powerful wizards that are specialized in the ice element.$(br)$(li)It is rumored that the Iceologers were Frostmancers corrupted by their own magic, because of this, Illagers exiled them of their lands.$(br)$(li)The few Iceologers still alive appears rarely in Snowy Biomes during the night.
On death they maybe drop the Wand of Freezing.

$(li)They can inflict you the Frostbite effect too, slowing your walking speed in 80% and damaging you every second.$(br)$(li)They can summon big ice block on you, when those hit you, inflicts a lot of damage.
